files.name: main.py
files.content:
while (True):
    NumBottles= int (input ("How many starting bottles?"))
    if (NumBottles<1):
        print ("You must enter 1 or more bottles")
        print ("")
        continue
    if (NumBottles>0):
        break
print ("")

endBottle=0
for counter in range (NumBottles,endBottle,-1):
    print (counter, "bottles of Slurm on the wall.")
    print (counter, "bottles of Slurm..")
    print ("Take one down, pass it around..")
    print (counter-1, "bottles of Slurm on the wall.")
    print ("")

print ("No more bottles of Slurm on the wall!")
